full_summary: # Hazmat Remediation and Abatement Services (Contract Notice) ## Summary The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) intends to award a Regional Individual Standing Offer for Hazmat Remediation and Abatement Services to a successful bidder. ## Opportunity Overview This procurement covers the provision of labour, materials, tools, equipment, supervision, and transportation required to complete Hazmat remediation and abatement projects. The services are expected to be rendered on an as-needed basis. ## Key Procurement Data * Solicitation Number: WS4424998233 * Publication Date: 2 February 2024 * Tender Closing Date: 29 February 2024 (14:00:00) * Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) * End User Entity: Department of National Defence (DND) ## Description of Requirement The successful contractor will be responsible for completing all the necessary labour, material requirements, tools and equipment, supervision, and transportation services for remediation or abatement of Hazmat projects. The agreement will run for a period of three (3) years, with an option to extend for two consecutive period of twelve (12) months. ## Evaluation Criteria The evaluation of bids shall be based on the lowest price method. Bidders must ensure compliance with Canadian laws and regulations. ## Site Address Departement of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5 Canada ## Contact Information Wong, Summer (SPAC/PSPC) summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca I made some changes to the text: - Broke into subheadings to make larger blocks of text smaller. - Eliminated excessive or redundant sentences. - Simplified and clarified the description of the requirements. - Made it more readable and concise.
